entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}rode overnight to reach Kiccigiorgi{F801}at dawn.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}rode overnight to reach Kiccigiorgi{F801}at dawn.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,43004}Have no fear, sir. We Samurai are{F801}here to help.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,5,10,1,2}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,43004}Have no fear, sir. We Samurai are{F801}here to help.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old villager\0{F87A,38}{F813,0,43005}O God... You have not forsaken us...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old villager\0{F87A,38}{F813,0,43005}O God... You have not forsaken us...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,7,1,1}{F813,0,43006}Sir, did I hear you right? Did you{F801}speak of demons...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,7,1,1}{F813,0,43006}Sir, did I hear you right? Did you{F801}speak of demons...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old villager\0{F87A,38}{F813,0,43007}M-Monsters I've never seen before{F801}came... and they... they went setting{F801}fire to the village...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,43008}That dreadful visage... I know what{F801}I saw! The demons from the fairy-{F801}stories have appeared in our time!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old villager\0{F87A,38}{F813,0,43007}M-Monsters I've never seen before{F801}came... and they... they went setting{F801}fire to the village...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,43008}That dreadful visage... I know what{F801}I saw! The demons from the fairy-{F801}stories have appeared in our time!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old villager\0{F87A,38}{F813,0,43009}A few others escaped to Kiccigiorgi{F801}Forest. Blessed Samurai, I beg{F801}of you...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,43010}Please save them... Save the rest{F801}of the villagers...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old villager\0{F87A,38}{F813,0,43009}A few others escaped to Kiccigiorgi{F801}Forest. Blessed Samurai, I beg{F801}of you...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,43010}Please save them... Save the rest{F801}of the villagers...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,7,1,1}{F813,0,43011}I shudder to think that the demons{F801}have encroached this far...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,7,1,1}{F813,0,43011}I shudder to think that the demons{F801}have encroached this far...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,1,1,1}{F813,0,43012}Someone bring this elder a hot{F801}drink and show him to our healers.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,1,1,1}{F813,0,43012}Someone bring this elder a hot{F801}drink and show him to our healers.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,1,1,1}{F813,0,43013}My fellow Samurai, our destination{F801}now is Kiccigiorgi Forest.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,1,1,1}{F813,0,43013}My fellow Samurai, our destination{F801}now is Kiccigiorgi Forest.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}followed Hope to the interior of{F801}Kiccigiorgi Forest...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}followed Hope to the interior of{F801}Kiccigiorgi Forest...{F801}
